name: Kick-Tout
description: An online marketplace where shoe lovers can buy, sell, and trade their shoes. Users can create an account, create unique posts, and interact with other user's posts.
tech: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, Node, Express, MySQL with Sequelize, Axios

name: Food Guru
description: An app to help you find and keep track of recipes. Create your own account and save recipes to each day of the week. Also, all saved recipes for the week will have their ingredients added to the user's shopping list.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, jQuery, Node, Express, MySQL with Sequelize, Passport.js for authentication

name: Employee Directory
description: A small full stack app build with React, keep track of employees and add new ones to the database. Users can also sort the results by category alphabetically.
tech: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, React, Node, Express, MongoDB with Mongoose

name: Fitness Tracker
description: An app using a prebuilt frontend that required me to add a backend with Express and MongoDB. Users can create and add their own exercises and see their stats on the Dashboard page. The Dashboard page displays all of their info with stylized graphs.
tech: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node, Express, MongoDB with Mongoose
